Confessions & Fine Print

Why did I start this seminary?

Because in 2019, gravity dropped me during a stakeout and my evidence box floated away singing hymns. I swore never again.

Is this accredited?

By the Moonlit Association of Suspicious Cats and one very convincing typewriter.

Do object students bite?

Only the staplers. We issue tiny gloves and emotional support sardines.
